scripts.proxima:setup: yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli install && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli build
scripts.proxima:create: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev nextjs create -d ../../src/components/cms
scripts.proxima:components: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev nextjs components -d ../../src/components/cms
scripts.proxima:fragments: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev nextjs fragments -d ../../src/components/cms
scripts.proxima:factory: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev nextjs factory -d ../../src/components/cms
scripts.proxima:list: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev types list -d ../../src/components/cms
scripts.proxima:pull: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev types pull -o ../../src/components/cms
scripts.proxima:help: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev help
scripts.proxima:info: yarn proxima:build && yarn workspace @epinova/proxima-cli run dev cms info
